Interface AssignmentNode

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ASTNode, ExpressionNode, StatementNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:

    public interface AssignmentNode
extends ExpressionNode
    The node to represent an assignment.

    • Method Detail

      • getLeftValue

        IdentifierNode getLeftValue()
        The left value of this node. The left node is an identifier (variable). The left value is the target of the assignment.
        Returns:
        The left value of this node.

      • setLeftValue

        void setLeftValue(IdentifierNode identifier)
        Set the left value of the assignment. The left node is an identifier (variable). The left value is the target of the assignment.
        Parameters:
        identifier - The identifier to set as the left value.

      • getRightValue

        ExpressionNode getRightValue()
        The right value of this node. The right value is an expression of any kind. The right value is the value to assign to the left value.
        Returns:
        the identifier of this assignment.

      • setRightValue

        void setRightValue(ExpressionNode node)
        Set the right value of this node. The right value is an expression of any kind. The right value is the value to assign to the left value.
        Parameters:
        node - The statement to use as the right value.
